name: Classic Hoodie
details: A comfortable and stylish hoodie with a classic design, suitable for everyday wear.

name: Sporty Zip Hoodie
details: A zip-up hoodie with a sporty look, perfect for workouts and casual outings.

name: Cozy Fleece Hoodie
details: Stay warm and cozy with this fleece-lined hoodie, great for chilly weather.

name: Graphic Print Hoodie
details: Express your style with a hoodie featuring unique and eye-catching graphic prints.

name: Vintage Wash Hoodie
details: A hoodie with a vintage wash for a worn-in and retro vibe, perfect for a laid-back look.

name: Tech Fleece Pullover
details: Upgrade your hoodie collection with this tech fleece pullover, combining style and functionality.

name: Striped Hoodie
details: Add a touch of style with this striped hoodie, perfect for a trendy and casual look.

name: Hooded Sweatshirt Dress
details: Stay comfortable and fashionable with this hooded sweatshirt dress, ideal for a relaxed style.

name: Color Block Hoodie
details: Make a statement with this color block hoodie, featuring bold and contrasting colors.

name: Cropped Hoodie
details: Elevate your streetwear style with this cropped hoodie, perfect for a modern and edgy look.
